Test Name: PHOSPHODIESTERASE 10A (PDE10A) IGG, Tissue Immunofluorescence Titer, Serum
Purpose: To detect and quantify PDE10A IgG antibodies in serum using a tissue immunofluorescence assay.
Container: Serum collection tube (e.g., red-top or serum separator tube)
Equipment: Fluorescence microscope; PDE10A IgG immunofluorescence reagent kit
